name: Die Hard: But It's Based On The Writer Versus Artist Discourse I Vaguely Heard About Through A David Lynch Meme
name_original: Die Hard: But It's Based On The Writer Versus Artist Discourse I Vaguely Heard About Through A David Lynch Meme
description:
I'd wager the title is pretty self explanatory but here's my zine about what if Die Hard was instead about discourse on who's better, artists or writers. Discourse that I only know about through a meme about David Lynch's cameo in Twin Peaks.

To read this, download the BOOK file, and to print it out as an actual zine, download the PRINT file.
